message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it, but only if you buy it now. If you don't buy it now, the price will go back to the original $10000.
I need more information about the product's quality before making a decision.

I see you're being cautious! I can assure you that this product is indeed high-quality, and it's a rare opportunity to get one at the original price of $10000. I'm willing to give you a 5% discount if you buy it now, and I'll also throw in a free inspection report that verifies its quality. Don't miss out on this chance to get a great deal!
Thank you for the assurance and the additional benefits. I believe this is a good opportunity to purchase a high-quality product at a discounted price, including a free inspection report.

I'm glad you were able to get a good deal on the previous product! However, I want to be transparent with you about this new product. Given the uncertainty around the quality of the product and the lack of a guarantee, I prefer to pass on this opportunity and look for a more certain high-quality product.
